attributes.action: Introduce animal welfare to the school curriculum
attributes.additional_details:
Animal welfare and awareness of animal cruelty, should be taught in all schools.  This would be an opportunity to reduce the number of animal abuse cases while teachng them that tormenting, can be dangerous, and is also cruel.

Trips to animal sanctuaries, would allso prove beneficial, since it would allow children to witnessthe plight of animals that are abused, and neglected.
